summary: A screwball comedy about a gay couple at a straight couple's wedding.
cast: Alexis Arquette|Christian Maelen|Luna Lauren Velez|Jamie Harrold|Guillermo Díaz|Maddie Corman|Marianne Hagan|Tuc Watkins|Elizabeth Rodriguez|Patricia Mauceri|Marni Nixon|Dechen Thurman|Jordan Roth|Mateo Gómez|Arden Myrin|Richard Salamanca|Leonard Berdick|Chris John|Lane Janger|Anthony Patellis|Carlos Rodríguez|Nathaniel Bonini|Gabriella Bring|John Samuel Jordan|Héctor Ramos
title: Creo que sí
